title: Interpretation of a dream about magic in the house

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing magic in the house in a dream for a single girl When a single girl sees magic in her dream. It symbolizes that she is a girl who does not exploit her mind, and she must think carefully so as not to miss a lot of things. Seeing magic in a dream can be a warning that it has power over the existence One. Those who try to fall into it and get hurt should be careful. In case she sees a magician performing magic in her dream. This dream is a warning to her that there is a person in a relationship with him who is lying to her in the name of love. If a girl sees that magic is present in her own room, buried inside It is a sign of Satan’s obsession with her, until she falls into vulgarity. She must devote herself and preserve her religion. To see magic in her dream performed by people from her relatives is a warning that there are people who wish her harm and do not wish her well, so she prays to God to leave her. Perhaps it indicates that there are people who wish her harm and do not wish her well. The presence of magic in a single woman’s dream indicates that her life will be greatly affected. And that the things she wants are not enough for her, and this is a reason for the deterioration of her psychological state. See also: Dreams of Magic. Interpretation of the presence of magic in the home in a dream for a married woman. When magic appears in a dream for a married woman. It is related to the presence of magic in the home in a dream for a married woman. A fraudster wants to harm her. She should pray a lot to God to keep him away from her. Seeing magic in a dream is a sign of many disagreements and problems with her family. And God knows best. Perhaps the appearance of sihr in a woman’s dream. It serves as a sign for her to be more devoted to prayer and the acts of obedience that she must perform. Sihr buried inside the house in a dream. It indicates money acquired from an illegal or legal party, and she must adhere to According to the good law. Seeing magic in a dream for a married woman can be a sign for her not to use wisdom when facing a problem or crisis. God knows best. Deciphering the magic of a married woman in a dream. It symbolizes the right path that he is taking after he was taking the wrong path and that Religion is followed, God willing. In the event that a woman breaks magic in a dream and she is suffering from an illness. This symbolizes that she will be cured, God willing. Perhaps the appearance of magic in a dream inside the woman’s home. A sign that her entire family is not devoted to the teachings of the Islamic religion. This dream should He warns them about it, so he advises them and prays for them. The touch of magic in a married woman’s dream is not worthy of praise for her. It may be a sign of the divorce that will happen to her and the demolition of the house, and she must pray a lot to God Almighty. And if she cannot touch this magic, then tell her that the problems will disappear. Who is back with her husband and her marital stability again. Seeing magic in a married woman’s dream is a sign that she is not thinking broadly about things. She is not using her mind with good wisdom and this results in a negative impact on the problems that exist in her life. Magic is the family problems that A woman falls into it, and God knows best. Breaking the spell in a dream, it is better for her to remove the disease if it is already present. Interpretation of seeing magic in the house in a dream for a man and its meaning. Buried magic in a dream is considered a person. Warning

title: Interpretation of the vision of sitting in the street for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of sitting on the street in a dream about one girl. The only girl who saw herself sitting on the road was solid. It is a sign of the stability of her life, and that she feels safe. The vision of sitting on a dirty and dusty road in the dream of the unmarried woman who cleaned it before she sat on it. It appears That he will fall into sin, but he will excel early and repent to God Almighty. As for the girl who dreamed that she was sitting in the street but was afraid and disturbed. It is a metaphorical expression of her intense fear in her real life that arises from the many problems she faces. Seeing her sitting on a clean road in The dream of an unmarried girl means that she is well-intentioned, characterized by nobility and high morals with others. A girl who sees herself sitting on the street in front of a company she applied to for her dream job. It is a sign of a lot of sustenance, which she will get from engaging in a good job. And if she sees A single girl sees herself sitting on the street, with someone she doesn't really know. It is a sign that she is elegant, friendly, and loved by everyone. But if she sees herself sitting with a handsome young man she knows in a dream, this is a metaphorical expression of her love for someone and her desire to marry him. The girl who Watching herself was sitting on a street full of schools or universities and he was clean. He has good skin and is very successful in his studies. And when a girl sees in her dream that she is sitting on the airport road, this is a good omen for traveling and starting a new life full of success and happiness. See also: Interpretation of seeing the green earth In a dream in detail, interpretation of the vision of sitting on the street in a dream for a married woman. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is sitting in the corridor of her house, this is evidence of the stability of her circumstances and her married life. When a married woman sits on a difficult dirt road, the dream is a metaphor for the good news that she will hear about her husband and his status in his work. As for a married woman, if she dreams that she is sitting on a road on unstable ground in a dream, this indicates that there are disagreements with her husband or that her husband’s financial situation is faltering. If a married woman sees that she is sitting on a crooked road in a dream, this indicates that her husband is treating her unjustly. Honesty. When a young married woman dreams that her husband gave her a piece of land in a dream, this symbolizes pregnancy. If the married woman is old and the man gives her land, this is a sign of many good things on the way for her. As for the woman who sees herself sitting in a dream on the street Narrow and dirty, this means that she suffers a lot with her husband’s family. As for the woman who sees herself cleaning the floor in the street, she may be sitting on it in the dream. This indicates that she has been able to solve her problems with her husband. Interpretation of the vision of sitting on the road in a dream about the man and its meaning: A person who suffers From poverty and lack of money if he sees himself sitting on a road full of greenery and plants in a dream. This is good news for his abundant food and for the improvement of his financial condition. As for a single man who sees himself on an empty road in a dream, this is a sign of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating rice

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating rice: Seeing rice in a dream is one of the visions that many people see. Rice is one of the basic foods that many love and is an essential ingredient in every table. Through this article, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating rice on a different website. Interpretation of a dream about eating white rice: Seeing white rice It indicates good faith and good deeds. If the dreamer is a merchant, then this vision is evidence of the success of his trade and people’s interest in his goods. If the dreamer is on his sick bed and sees that he is eating white rice, this indicates that his health condition will improve and he will recover soon. If the dreamer sees white rice turning black, This indicates that the balance will turn and that what is feared will happen. Interpretation of seeing rice with milk in a dream. Seeing rice with milk in a dream indicates good and abundant money. If the dreamer sees rice mixed with milk in his dream, this indicates that he will face many difficulties in his life, but with the passage of time he will He gets used to it. If he sees that the rice is mixed with dirt, this indicates that the person is afflicted with a disease and it also indicates separation between friends and family. Also, seeing milk indicates that he has regained the right that he did not have the ability to restore or recover something that was lost to him. If The dreamer saw milk mixed with black rice, this is evidence of a lack of knowledge of the truth, weakness, and mixing truth with falsehood. Also, this dream indicates that someone is planning and wishing you harm and is looking at what is in your hands and your life with a jealous eye. Seeing rice with milk indicates confusion of vision and things and distraction. Among more than one goal: Interpretation of seeing cooked rice for a married woman in a dream. If the wife sees that she is preparing rice with meat and soup, this indicates that she will receive a happy occasion. If she sees herself preparing large quantities of rice, this indicates that she will live a happy life to welcome a new child. The wife who prepares rice in her dream It foretells that she will make a great living and that her husband will get a lot of money. If she sees that she is preparing rice with fruits, this indicates a big change in her life for the better. If the wife sees in her dream that she is cooking rice, this means that she is living a married life full of happiness and bliss. If she sees that she is preparing A food feast, and this feast contains dishes of rice and pieces of cooked meat. This indicates that God will give you many good things and money, which will be an occasion to change her life. If the wife sees her husband preparing rice for her, this indicates a noticeable change in her life and she will live a good and comfortable life. Interpretation of seeing rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If a pregnant woman sees that she is preparing rice and it tastes sweet, this indicates that she has heard good news and is preparing a large feast due to this news. If she sees that her husband is the one who brought her rice, this indicates his love for her and the affection between them. Interpretation of seeing rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Sirin: A man who sees rice in his dream indicates that he will obtain abundant money and great sustenance. Also, seeing it in some interpretations is evidence of health, nutrition, and well-being. All of this indicates

Interpretation of a dream of an old man placing his hand on my head in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of an old man placing his hand on my head in a dream. We did not find clear meanings. Let us see this, except that seeing a pregnant woman whose husband places his hand on her head may indicate his support for her, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees it as a promotion, it may represent calm and stability, and God knows the unseen, and it may also indicate a desire for things that will maintain him.

title: Interpretation of sesame oil in a dream and seeing the anus in a dream

preview.html: A dream about sesame oil indicates good behavior and shows happiness and abundance of livelihood and other interpretations that we will explain to the single woman, to the married woman, to the pregnant woman, to the divorced woman, to the man, such as drinking sesame oil, cooking or frying food with sesame oil, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others on the subject: Interpretation of sesame oil in a dream The meaning of sesame oil in a dream is the combination of this world and the next, as it indicates guidance, and frying with sesame oil indicates the value of a person. Likewise, eating sesame oil in a dream, or that its oil indicates sustenance, comfort, and elevation, and perhaps it indicates good deeds and beneficial knowledge. And seeing sesame oil In a dream, it refers to something unknown and mysterious, and it may indicate suffering and dedication to work without reaping any benefit. Seeing cooking or eating sesame oil in a dream indicates the dreamer’s effort to do the right things that will change his life for the better. Eating sesame oil in a dream indicates abundance. Money and livelihood. Seeing a plate of sesame oil in a dream for an unmarried woman who did not eat it and someone ate it, is evidence of her strong connection to the same person in the near future. Also, seeing a man indicates that he wants to eat a lot of sesame oil, and desires it greatly, but he could not Obtaining it, this is evidence that his worries will be relieved and soon he will be relieved, because he will get rid of all his problems. A man who sees himself eating sesame oil in a dream is evidence that he will soon make a profit from his trade and make good profits. Seeing sesame oil in a dream means that the dreamer will get Soon he will get a lot of money from his trade and he will get a lot of goods and get rid of his debts. Seeing sesame oil in a merchant’s dream also indicates that he will increase in his money, his trade will increase soon, and he will become good. A man giving a woman a dish full of sesame oil in a dream indicates good Luck and success in work and career. A young man who sees a girl giving him a plate of sesame oil in a dream and the taste of sesame is good is evidence that he will soon have a beautiful wife who will be good in religion and morals. A young man giving sesame oil to one person in a dream and the other was happy, this is evidence of cooperation. And the kindness that a person enjoys in public life, and he will also obtain a lot of livelihood. Sesame oil in a dream, in general, is evidence of positive financial changes that the dreamer will gain in the near future, and for an unmarried woman, this indicates that she will marry a young man with good morals. Interpretation of oil Sesame in a man’s dream: If a man dreams that he is selling sesame oil that is not good, and people are willing to buy from him, then this is evidence that this person is a hypocrite and a deceiver, and if a person dreams that he is grinding sesame and grinding sesame. Extracting sesame oil in a dream to offer it to a girl, this is evidence of marriage or a relationship. An intimate relationship with a good and beautiful girl, and if a man sees in his dream that he is buying sesame oil and then roasting and grinding the sesame and distributing it to people, then this is evidence. That this person is generous, loves those around him, and is loved by everyone. Interpretation of sesame oil

title: Interpretation of seeing thunder and lightning in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing thunder and lightning in a dream Lightning and thunder are two natural phenomena that we see in winter, and seeing them in a dream has many meanings and symbols, some of which express goodness, luck, and abundant pleasure, while others bring nothing but sorrows, worries, and misery to their owner. Jurists rely on clarifying their meanings in the case of the dreamer and the events he saw, and we will include all the details related to this matter in the following article. Seeing thunder and lightning in a dream. Interpretation scholars have explained many of the meanings and connotations associated with seeing thunder and lightning in a dream, as follows: If the dreamer sees lightning And thunder in his dream, this is a clear indication of the arrival of gifts, benefits, and abundance of blessings in his life in the coming period. The interpretation of a dream about lightning and thunder in a person’s vision expresses the emergence of many positive changes in his life on the social and emotional level, which will make him happy and stable. In the event that the dreamer suffers from Financial faltering, lack of livelihood, lack of money and he sees lightning and thunder in his dream, he will obtain a lot of material spoils and will be able to return the money to its owners and live in peace. If the lightning and thunder in the dream are accompanied by rain in the dream of a person being punished by imprisonment, then this dream is good and expresses the approaching date of his freedom and innocence. From all the charges against him. Seeing thunder and lightning in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the meanings and symbols associated with seeing lightning and thunder in a dream, which are as follows: If the dreamer sees thunder in his dream and it is not accompanied by rain, then this is a clear indication that he will be exposed to a major disaster that he cannot Overcoming it, it turns his life upside down, leading him to misery and unhappiness. Sadness. If one works in trade and sees in his dream the appearance of lightning and thunder together, this is a sign of repentance to God and abandoning negative attitudes and unwanted actions and replacing them with better ones so that people do not separate from him. If the fortuneteller is outside his homeland and sees lightning and thunder in his dream, he will return To his family in peace and nothing bad will happen to him. The interpretation of a dream about the appearance of lightning and thunder in a merchant’s dream expresses the doubling of profits, an increase in profits, and the success of all the projects he started. If a person suffering from an illness dreams of lightning without rain, this is a bad omen and symbolizes the deterioration of his health and he may die soon. Lightning In a dream: If a person sees lightning in his house in a dream while hearing the sound of thunder, this is a sign of a lot of turmoil and tension between family members and great differences that reach the point of alienation and abandonment. If the dreamer sees that he has been struck by lightning, this indicates that he will be imprisoned for participating in activities Illegal in the coming period. The interpretation of a dream about being struck by lightning and death in a person’s vision indicates committing immorality, turning away from God and walking in the path of Satan, and he must refrain from these hateful actions so as not to become his fate. Be hell. Interpretation of a dream about thunder and lightning in Nabulsi. If a person hears destructive thunder in his dream, this vision is a bad omen and symbolizes the spread of chaos, injustice, and the outbreak of war in

title: Interpretation of the key in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a lock and a key in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of keys and locks, whether Diya is broken, bought, opens the door for a girl, for a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, to see the key to the car, the house, the wooden door, the golden iron, and the iron. Many, but interpretation of the key in a dream Keys are considered one of the best things that can be seen in a dream. Seeing a key can indicate relief from anxiety, recovery from illness, strength in religion, or fulfillment of hopes. Therefore, we will discuss the different interpretations of seeing keys in a dream. According to scholars, the key indicates money, and either breaking it indicates the destruction or loss of the money, as God Almighty says: Whoever dreams that he has collided with a key or a key will be affected by power or money, and luck is equal to the key, and if a woman sees that the key It was cast on her, she will marry a man. Whoever dreams that he opened a door with a key and it opens for him, then he begs for a prayer that will be answered, or he will be blessed with justice and goodness in his religion and in this world, or he wills. Receiving the request he is making. And if he sees that it is difficult for him to open the door, he will not achieve what he is asking for until he opens it. Whoever dreams of closing a new door will marry a righteous woman, and if he sees that she opened it, he will leave her. Whoever dreams of closing an old door will leave his wife, and if he sees that he has opened it, he will be satisfied with her. Whoever sees that the lock has been closed or opened will marry a woman. Interpretation of holding a key in a dream. Whoever sees that he is holding a key in his hand, this indicates purifying the water, or washing the water. As for the one who sees the key falling from his hand, this is evidence of his negligence in prayer. As for the one who sees himself carrying many keys, this is good news for acquiring a lot of money. As for whoever sees in a dream that he holds the keys to Paradise, this indicates that he has something related to religion, or traveling for Hajj or Umrah, or acquiring treasure or inheritance. Anything that is opened with a key is a sign of good news, and anything that is closed with a key is a sign of bad news. Whoever sees that something opens with a key and opens easily, this means that he will ask for the help of a specific person to relieve himself. As for whoever sees that there is a woman who received the key from him, this indicates marriage. Interpretation of breaking the key in a dream: Breaking a key in a dream means bad things will happen, but losing it means disturbing things and delaying the request. As for losing the entire key ring, it indicates the loss of a loved one or the loss of a job, money, or business, but if you find a key, this means that you will know a secret that you will benefit greatly from. Interpretation of the iron key in a dream: As for the iron key in the dream, it indicates victory for God Almighty, while the wooden key is considered very bad because it indicates bribery or resentment. As for whoever sees that there is a mark on the key, this indicates that there is an indication on the path to wealth. Interpretation of a key without teeth in a dream. Whoever sees the key without teeth in a dream, this is evidence of injustice to the orphan. Interpretation of the position of the key in the dream. As for whoever sees a key in the road, this indicates Acquiring an Arab animal. If he sees the key on the doorstep of the house, this indicates marriage or asceticism

title: What is the interpretation of prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of prayer in a dream by Ibn SirinPrayer is known as an important means of getting closer to the Lord of the Worlds. Performing prayer as if you are in the hands of God Almighty contains praise, exaltation, supplication, and humility. Learn from commentators through the interpretation of prayer in a dream. What is the interpretation of prayer in a dream? Never the interpretation of prayer in a dream. It is necessary to know that God Almighty made it a tool that helps us meet our needs, and seeing the Istikhara prayer is an expression of choosing the truth without ambiguity and the prayer of seeking forgiveness. The way to get rid of sins. As for the greeting in the mosque, it has a separate meaning, which is spending it for the sake of God and the charity that he gives forever. We also find that the eclipse prayer and the eclipse prayer are evidence of his repentance for the mistakes he committed against him in the previous period, and seeing the rain prayer has clear meanings for the country passing through a high period. Prices and lack of resources, but the dream promises us a change in the state of the country and its exit from its crisis without harming the people. Seeing him praying in front of a large group of men and women, separated between them, is evidence that he will obtain a great position that will make him an authority over them in the future. His supplication in the dream after the prayer is confirmation of his connection He who is strong in his Lord and sincere in Him, if he does not mention Him during or after his prayer, it means that he is praying hypocritically so that it appears before him. He should be freed from this trait and take care of his religion and his Lord until he reaches Paradise. Deliberately cutting him off from prayer is not a good omen, because we should not care about what is around us during prayer, but rather submit to the Lord of the Worlds, and thus indicates that the dreamer has completely cut off from the family, He does. He does not want them or ask them no matter what happens. It is important that he pleases God. If he treats his family well, God will be pleased with him and honor him in his life and after his death. Bowing in a dream portends the dreamer defeating his enemies and achieving everything he wants, because in reality it is of great importance in explaining his refusal of zakat. What is the interpretation of prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Imam Ibn Sirin says: The vision has many meanings that differ depending on the situations and places on which the dreamer prays. Praying on the ground without a rug or prayer rug is evidence of his poor financial condition, which makes him live in distress, and if he does not wear something He hides it in the dream and stands up to pray, which means that he will be buried. . The mistake that makes him one of the sinners, so he must take a sermon from this vision and atone for his sins so that he can live happily and free of problems. Laughter during prayer angers God and His Messenger, so seeing him in it cannot be happy news for the dreamer. Likewise, if he sees himself drunk During his prayer, this is a sign that he does not bear witness to the truth and follows falsehood in his actions, and therefore if he abandons these actions, he will find the door of repentance open by his Lord. He will be happy with him as soon as possible. Seeing him praying in the mosque clearly expresses his love for mosques, and that he does not abandon any duty if he does not go to pray, and supplication indicates a desire that he wants and seeks to fulfill. His prayer at night and his reverence in the dream are confirmation of his parents’ contentment and their intense love for him. He does not treat them badly, but rather provides them with all their requirements without contradicting them, and this makes him attentive.

title: Dream interpretation of seeing a bad person in a dream and its interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an evil person: Our lives are full of people with different orientations, beliefs, morals, and customs. There are people we like to have by our side and we always try to improve our relationship with them. What they do is desirable, so you find that everyone tries as much as possible to avoid dealing with them so that the enemy of their behavior does not pass by. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an evil person: It is possible that there are evil people in your life who negatively affect your life, so you seek to stay away from them and not mix with them. To dream To see a bad personThere are many clues and interpretations, some of which are mentioned: Many interpreters have interpreted that seeing an evil person in a dream is one of the dreams that does not bode well. It should be noted that seeing an evil person is one of the signs that the dreamer will suffer losses. It is also A sign that the viewer will suffer a major financial loss in his money. If the bad person is not aware of his vision, this may indicate that he is a good person. The unknown and evil person in the dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain a prominent position in his life. Interpreters’ interpretations of the evil person varied, Depending on the details of each fortuneteller’s dream and his own circumstances. See also: Interpretation of dreams for a sick, dying person in a dream in detail from the most famous interpretation scholars. Interpretation of dreams for an evil person I know who looks at you with admiration. There are people in our lives who can make life another life, due to their behavior, style, and morals that we wish would be present in Everyone around us, and I dream of a bad man I know looking at you with admiration, may indicate: - In the event that an unmarried girl sees her lover looking at her and smiling at her, she is one of the good people for her. Also, the lover’s smile towards his girlfriend and his admiration for her indicates that their engagement is approaching, and God knows best. It should be noted that this vision indicates the achievements and successes that this girl will achieve. It is a sign of the girl’s self-confidence and her satisfaction with what she is doing. See also: Interpretation of the dream of drinking sherbet in a dream and its effects. Interpretation of the dream of someone oppressing. The people around us differ in their behavior and personalities, and on the one hand Other, we find that there are people whose behavior is defiant, oppressive, and unreasonable. A dream of being subjugated by someone indicates these signs: It is considered that the dreamer wants to seek help and advice from others. It is also one of the signs that the fortuneteller is more confident. It is worth noting that this vision shows interest in the behavior of those around you, and not everyone wishes you success. It is also evidence that the dreamer is afraid of being betrayed. Many and varied interpretations came to this dream in a dream, according to the details of the dreamer’s dream. Interpretation of dreams to strangle someone you hate. There are many people. Those who hate you and those around you, and they are enemies of your success and progress and always want to be better than you. If you dream that you are choking someone you hate, there are many signs, but not limited to: It can be considered a sign that the dreamer will suffer from a serious illness in the future, and God knows best. Also, seeing Choking many people is one sign that the dreamer will get...

There are people in our lives who can make life another life, due to their behavior, style, and morals that we wish would be present in Everyone around us, and I dream of a bad man I know looking at you with admiration, may indicate: - In the event that an unmarried girl sees her lover looking at her and smiling at her, she is one of the good people for her.
